## Course information

The objective of this five-day [training course](https://rdatatoolbox.github.io/), co-organized by the [FRB-CESAB](https://www.fondationbiodiversite.fr/en/about-the-foundation/le-cesab/) and the [GdR EcoStat](https://sites.google.com/site/gdrecostat/), is to train researchers in reproducibility, software development and version management tools (e.g. `git`, `GitHub`, `Quarto`, `renv`, `Docker`), applied to biodiversity research.
:::
